buildCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));if(p.scripts && p.scripts.prepare){delete p.scripts.prepare;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));}" && cd apps/web && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));if(p.scripts && p.scripts.prepare){delete p.scripts.prepare;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));}" && npm install && npm run build
installCommand: node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));if(p.scripts && p.scripts.prepare){delete p.scripts.prepare;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));}" && cd apps/web && node -e "const fs=require('fs');const p=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package.json'));if(p.scripts && p.scripts.prepare){delete p.scripts.prepare;fs.writeFileSync('package.json',JSON.stringify(p,null,2));}" && npm install
